questions.title: WHO IS 1000 PLUS CAPITAL?
questions.description: 1000 PLUS CAPITAL is a proprietary trading firm which provides funding to traders. In order to determine if a trader has all the qualities we seek, we have implemented a 2-step evaluation process. These two phases are divided into the Assessment and the Verification phases. Upon successful completion, traders are offered a placement in the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Proprietary Trading firm, where they can remotely manage up to $2,000,000USD.  As a 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Trader, you are eligible to keep up to 70% of the profits you generate. We cover all losses, if any.

questions.title: Where is your office? How do I contact you?
questions.description: We are headquartered in the United States of America.
You can contact us by filling out the contact form, sending us an email, using Messenger, WhatsApp or call our phone number directly – all of these details can be found in the contact section.

questions.title: Who can join 1000 PLUS CAPITAL?
questions.description: We accept beginner and experienced traders from all around the world who are at least 18 years of age. We offer a 30 Day Free Trial where you can try trading as if you were in the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Verification stage. During the Free Trial, you will have the ability to test the platform and you will also have access to analyze your performance.

questions.title: How do I start?
questions.description: Before you decide to accept the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment, we want to make sure that you know what our evaluation objectives are.

Please note you can’t receive our 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account based on your performance in the Free Trial or any other external track record. Our Evaluation Process is designed in a way to provide us with sufficient grounds to ascertain your trading skills and allow you to trade our 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account.

questions.title: Why should I join 1000 PLUS CAPITAL?
questions.description: Trading is well known to be difficult. As a trader, you will face many common problems. Our aim is to eliminate these problems to help you focus on maximizing profits.

questions.title: Trading an account that is too small (undercapitalization)?
questions.description: With the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Prop Trading firm, you can manage an account with a starting balance of $200,000 which can be scaled up to $2,000,000.

questions.title: Fear of losing your own money?
questions.description: Another benefit of trading for 1000 PLUS CAPITAL is that you won’t be responsible for any losses if any. You don’t need to fear losing if you literally have nothing to lose.

questions.title: Psychological pressures?
questions.description: We provide a tailor-made solution to monitor your account’s performance helping you analyze your trades in order to eliminate poor decisions. We don’t set monthly targets; you trade at your own convenience. All you need to do is observe the daily and maximum drawdowns.

questions.title: Growth limitations?
questions.description: Our profit split is 70% to you, our scaling plan wont be beaten, our account balances double each time you achieve 10% profit. You can chose to withdrawal profits and compound your account at the same time, the choice is yours.
Last but not least, the initial fee that you’ve paid will be refunded to you with the first Profit Split from the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account.

questions.title: How do I become an 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Trader?
questions.description: In order to become an 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Trader, you will have to pass our 2-step Evaluation Process.

questions.title: Phase 1: Assessment
questions.description: A 30 calendar day demo account where you prove your trading skills and discipline in observing the trading conditions. You will have superior account conditions in the form of our own 1000 PLUS CAPITAL account solution with very low commissions and institutional spreads. Once you complete all requirements, you will proceed to the second and final step of the evaluation. The minimum time to complete the assessment is 10 trading days.

questions.title: Phase 2:  Verification
questions.description: A 60 calendar day demo account to verify that you are a consistent trader. The trading conditions throughout the Verification stage are significantly easier. The minimum time to complete the verification is 10 trading days.

questions.title: How long does it take to become an 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Trader?
questions.description: The quickest time you could be managing your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account in as little as 20 trading days if you meet all the objectives.

questions.title: I have successfully passed the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment, now what?
questions.description: After you have passed all the Trading Objectives in the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment, you will see a notification in your Account MetriX informing you about your success, and you don’t need to trade the account any more once your Trading Objectives are marked as passed. We will be automatically alerted that you have passed your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment and we will proceed to evaluate your trading results accordingly.
After approximately 1-2 business days, we will then send you the new account login credentials for the Verification stage.

questions.title: If I breach the rules, do I get a second chance?
questions.description:
If you happen to breach any of the Trading Objectives, that particular account will be automatically invalidated and you lose the eligibility to continue. You can always try again from scratch and try again. Please note we don’t provide any discounts for repetitions. If you violate the Trading Objectives, your initial fee paid for the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment is forfeited so be sure to stick to the objectives.
There is, however, one exception. If you do NOT to breach any of the Trading Objectives(regardless of whether that is the Assessment or Verification phases) and your account balance being in at least some profit at the end of the trading duration, with all positions closed, we will provide you a new 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment free of charge. We know that sometimes the market conditions are not in the trader’s favour and we appreciate your good trading and ability to manage risk properly.

questions.title: What capital will I trade as a 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Trader?
questions.description:
During the verification phases the accounts we provide to our clients are demo accounts with virtual funds. After successful completion of the evaluation phase you will be trading on a live account. You will trade with the same account balance that you traded during the assessment phase.
If you wish to trade with a higher account balance, you can simply apply for another assessment, each assessment needs to be traded from the beginning, irrespective of the progress on your other accounts.

questions.title: Can I trade news?
questions.description: You can trade around news events without any restrictions.

questions.title: Do I need to close my positions overnight?
questions.description: You can keep your positions open overnight and over the weekend without any restrictions.

questions.title: Which instruments can I trade and what strategies am I allowed to use?
questions.description: Your trading style is completely up to you. We don’t limit or restrict your trading strategy, whether it’s discretionary trading, hedging, algorithmic trading, EAs, etc. As long as your trading is legitimate, conforms to the real market conditions there is no limitation to your trading style or strategy. We don’t even impose any limits on instruments or position sizes you trade. You can trade all the instruments and assets that are available in your trading platform (Forex, Indices, Commodities, Stocks, Crypto,…). We give you complete freedom here. If your system is profitable while respecting the rules, we’re happy to see you profit with us.

questions.title: How much capital will I work with?
questions.description:
1000 PLUS CAPITAL Traders will have the same account balance size as chosen for their preceding 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment and Verification.
We do not have upgrading options so you need to choose the appropriate account size right at the beginning when you are configuring your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment.

questions.title: How do I withdraw my profits?
questions.description:
The Profit Split on the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account can be requested on the 14th and or the 28th of each month, the withdrawal will be processed within 72 hours.
We don’t charge any commissions for withdrawals. You don’t need to achieve any minimum Profit to receive the 70% profit split.  
If you meet the conditions of our Scaling Plan, we increase the balance of your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account by 50%, up to $1M then up to $1.5M then $2M.
To double the account balance please ensure that 10% profit is maintained in the account at any given point.

questions.title: Are my profits taxed ?
questions.description: It is recommended that you consult a tax professional to discuss your options in your country/ jurisdiction.

questions.title: What are the account specifications?
questions.description:
The account specification can be seen directly in the trading platform. To view the instrument specification in MetaTrader, open your Market Watch (Ctrl+M), right-click on the concerned instrument and choose ‘specification’.
Please familiarize yourself with the offer and conditions of each instrument you trade.
The leverage we offer is up to 1:200 (Forex) and cannot be increased. The leverage can be lowered upon request

questions.title: What trading platform will I use?
questions.description: The Assessment, Verification and 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account will be traded on the most popular retail platform – MetaTrader 5

questions.title: How do I Start?
questions.description: Select the account size you wish to begin with, you will be redirected to the payment page after which you will receive the order confirmation email.

questions.title: What payment methods are available?
questions.description: You can pay for the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment via bank wire transfer, debit/credit card, Paypal, cryptocurrency.

questions.title: Do we charge any other fees? Are the fees recurrent?
questions.description: Absolutely Not, we don’t charge any additional or hidden fees. The fee for the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment covers it all, including the Verification. Moreover, your fee will be reimbursed to you with the first Profit Split on the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account.

questions.title: I paid for my 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment, when will I get the account?
questions.description: We start processing your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment account as soon as we receive the payment. We normally process your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment within just a few hours.

Once your trading account is active, you will receive your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment notification by email, and your login credentials to the trading platform can be found directly in your Client Area. Please monitor your mailbox, including spam/junk folders.
Your login credentials are private please ensure that you don’t authorize anybody besides yourself to access them.

questions.title: Why is there a fee?
questions.description: The fee mainly serves as a trader’s commitment to treat the account with the utmost care and responsibility. A trader has something in the game and the psychology is working. Also, the fee is just a marginal percentage compared to the size of the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account that you will receive after succeeding in the Evaluation Process. The good news is that you cannot lose more than this fee.
The fee also covers the use of all our unique applications.
We are looking for traders who are committed and can generate profits.
We offer a highly valued service, with trading conditions that our competitors cant match and and our packages are competitively priced.

questions.title: How many accounts can I have?
questions.description: We do not place any limit on the number of trading accounts you can have.

questions.title: How about the Free Trial?
questions.description: The Free Trial is a shortened version of the 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Assessment so you can get used to trading with us. The Free Trials serve our new traders to practice their trading skills and maintain within our trading objectives.

Please note that Free Trials don’t give you any eligibility to automatically secure your 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Account. Although your results might be good in the Free Trial, you still need to go through the Evaluation Process to become one of our 1000 PLUS CAPITAL Traders.
Our Free Trials are extremely popular and we have literally thousands of accounts taken every day. To accommodate the demand, only one Free Trial per trader is allowed at a time.

questions.title: Why is 1000 PLUS CAPITAL the best Prop Trading solution you can find?
questions.description: Its simple, for everything we have mentioned. Our trading conditions, objectives, scaling plan up to $2 Million. No other firm provides the leverage we do, we don’t limit you close your positions during news events, not even end of the day or the end of the week, keep positions open as long as you want. We aim to ensure every trader is profitable.
